name: Whirligig Media Player
summary: Whirligig is a versatile and powerful VR media player built for immersive playback of videos and images. Designed for viewers who want precision and control, Whirligig supports a wide range of projection types, including fisheye (90°–360°), equirectangular, cinema, dome, cubemap, planar, and fully customizable layouts. All projection types can be viewed in stereo, with support for both over-under and side-by-side 3D formats.
